basics.name: Han Zhang
basics.intro: I know how to build a robot from just a concept, to a real machine, and then eventually turn it into a commercial product.

academic interests.title: Robotics
highlights: Robot System Design (Full-stack, both hardware and software parts)

skills.name: Hardware Design
keywords: PCB, SMT, 3D Printing, Soldering, Machine Tools
Embeded System (RaspberryPi, STM32, Arduino, ESP32, 51, FPGA, DSP...)

experience.name: Dexta Robotics Inc.
highlights: For more details, please check our website. http://dextarobotics.com/

experience.name: Jaresh Tech Inc.
highlights: Lead the EVT (Engineering Verification Test) and DVT (Design Verification Test) of the product prototype.

awards.title: RoboCup @Home Open Platform
awards.summary: The RoboCup@Home league aims to develop service and assistive robot technology with high relevance for future personal domestic applications. It is the largest international annual competition for autonomous service robots.

awards.title: National Scholarship
awards.summary: China established and funded the National Scholarship to inspire ordinary undergraduates to study hard and develop morally, intellectually, and physically.

awards.title: GIX Innovation Competition
awards.summary: The GIX Innovation Competition, a worldwide event, invited young innovators from North America, Europe, and Asia to present their original and technologically inventive projects in areas such as the Internet of Things, wearable devices, intelligent hardware, XR, ubiquitous computing, and related fields.

awards.title: iF Design Award
awards.summary: The iF DESIGN AWARD, with nearly 11,000 entries from 56 countries last year, stands as one the most prestigious design awards in the world. Owned by the non-profit iF Design Foundation, the award emphasizes design's global impact and ensures impartiality with our professional jury upholding strict screening criteria.

awards.title: RedDot Award
awards.summary: Statement by the Jury: The Dexmo exoskeleton creates an intense user experience by giving the wearer a tactile experience of the virtual world. Its design is strikingly reminiscent of a human skeleton.

awards.title: IDC Robocon
awards.summary: IDC is an educational event that has been hold since 1990 to foster and develop creativity, technique and international experience of young future engineers. International teams of students take part of the contest, designing and building remotely controlled robots.

hobbies.name: Photography
keywords: Check out my time-lapse photography of the aurora (the Northern Lights).
